quote: Hereos. Idols. They're never who you think they are. Shorter. Nastier. Smellier. And when you finally meet them, there's something that makes you want to choke the shit out of them.
quote_letters: HEREOS IDOLS THEYRE NEVER WHO YOU THINK THEY ARE SHORTER NASTIER SMELLIER AND WHEN YOU FINALLY MEET THEM THERES SOMETHING THAT MAKES YOU WANT TO CHOKE THE SHIT OUT OF THEM
